entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `cref` block is disallowed when the referenced member of type contains any unconstrainted generic argument with nullable annotation #61076
  • Add more detailed scopes to C# language rules, to allow finer syntax coloring control #61074

Closed

  • The NotNullWhen attribute is not respected for out parameters #61073

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #61070
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/required-members #61068
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Do not suggest possible member names for unbound async identifier #61075
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Make NamingPreferences message-pack serializable #61006
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #61072
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61071
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #61067
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Use property pattern #61062
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Code generator fallback options #60882
    Area-IDE
